name: LINZ Data Service - Toitū Te Whenua - Land Information New Zealand
description: Open online access to New Zealand's most up-to-date land and seabed data. You can search, browse for and download data online on the LINZ Data Service (LDS). You can also integrate our APIs into your own applications. Data includes aerial imagery, elevation, topographic, hydrographic, property, boundaries and ownership, place names, street address and roads, Crown land.
